name: Trials of Erebus
description:
The Trials of Erebus follows Donkirk 'Donnie' Kingsley, who had just been inducted into the Order of Erebus by the Dagenharts.   However, Donnie is currently trapped in the Immaterial and needs to get back to the Material plane. 

W/S/A/D- TO MOVE

I- to Access Inventory

Esc- Yeet out the game.

It's still in development and the story is ongoing! 
Stick around for the updates!  Thank you so much for playing!  

Donations are accepted but not required
